price: E fortalecemo-lhe a soberania e concedemo-lhe a sabedoria e o falar peremptório.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
